title: Strengthening Learning Design Practice Competencies: Inquiry-Based Microlearning for Water Resource Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary water resource management knowledge and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze complex water resource issues by integrating interdisciplinary water resource knowledge.
Learners can design and apply effective communication strategies tailored to stakeholder-specific characteristics.
Learners can complete a project that solves real-world water resource management scenarios through inquiry-based learning activities in a mobile environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
